name: Clin T Adrenal Gland
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Assign 88 for in situ cases (behavior code /2). TNM does not include an in situ category for adrenal gland tumors.

**Note 2:** Tumor size must be known to assign a value of T1 or T2. You may use a physicianâ€™s statement of the T category if this is the only information in the medical record. 
* If the tumor appears to be in the T1 or T2 categories, but no size or category is specified, assign TX

**Note 3:** Assign the appropriate T category (T1, T2) based on the tumor size for the following descriptions

    Invasive carcinoma confined to adrenal gland
    Localized, NOS
